problem_text: Quadrilateral A B C D is inscribed in \odot Z such that m \angle B Z A = 104, m \widehat C B = 94, and A B \parallel D C. Find m \angle B D A.
compact_text: Quadrilateral ABCD is inscribed in \odot Z such that m \angle BZA = 104, m \widehat CB = 94, and AB \parallel DC. Find m \angle BDA.
annotat_text:
Quadrilateral $A B C D$ is inscribed in $\odot Z$ such that $m \angle B Z A=104, m \widehat{C B}=94,$ and $\overline{A B} \| \overline{D C} .$
Find $m \angle B D A$
